body.name: YIOU Air Purifier for Home Large Room up to 547 ft², H13 True HEPA Air Filter 20dB Air Cleaner Odor Eliminator for Allergies Smoke Dust Pollen, White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 17 hrs 45 mins
features: Adopted enhanced air duct system, YIOU air purifiers can purifiy up to 547 ft² room twice per hour and effectively block out air-born pollution.

3-Stage True HEPA Filter: Consisted of pre-layer, H13 true HEPA layer and activated carbon layer, YIOU air filter can capture large airborne particles, and decompose unpleasant odors in turn to relief respiratory discomfort.[Please search B0972641SV for replacement filter.]

Real-time Air Quality Indicator: Built in a high precision laser sensor, YIOU air purifiers for home will glow red/yellow/green to reveal poor/good/excellent air quality by detecting airborne particles as small as 0.3um.

Sleep within a Sound of Silence: For a halcyon and healthier sleep at night, YIOU air purifiers for bedroom can work at 20dB in sleep mode with the indicators half on or off and no buzz or beep. Using timer setting from 1-7 hours and child lock at the same time for better user experience.

Certificated Air Cleaner: Complying with Part 15 of the FCC rules, YIOU air purifier has a CADR of 140 CFM for smoke, 139 CFM for dust and 144 CFM for pollen, effective for wildfire smoke and allergies larger than 0.3 um
body.description: ☆The replaceable air filter is on sale! Please search B0972641SV for detail.☆ Each YIOU air purifier will be delivered with an original air filter which could be effective for 3 to 6 months.☆Note: Please do not use a voltage different to 110-120 V in case of damaging the device.☆

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helping indoor allergies & pet odor
reviews.reviewText: Easy to setup and get going... but don’t be like me and forget to remove the plastic packaging from the filter that comes already inside the machine 😂 I thought this was seriously broken for a minute when I first turned it on and heard a strange noise from the fan flapping the plastic around. DON’T BE LIKE ME lol Open the hatch on the bottom, pull the filter out, remove packaging, then reinsert the filter. Boom. Strange sound disappears like magic. ✨The auto mode setting and air quality laser sensor definitely work. When I turn my essential oil diffuser on in the same room the purifier light turns red (signaling bad air quality) and it audibly cranks the air purification up to high mode, so it’s clearly sensing the diffused oil particles or mist in the air. I don’t want the diffuser and purifier work against each other so I may have to alternate times or move one to a different room.The machine is pretty small and would be perfect for any small apartment. I lived in a 260 square foot studio in college and this is much smaller than the air conditioner I had to fit in that place. It’s lightweight, much lighter than two arms full of grocery bags. You could move it around your house all day if you needed to. However, I’m gonna keep mine seated by my kitty litter box to suck up those lovely little lion scents.The low mode is pretty darn quiet but the high mode is noisy, however I don’t mind it because I like white noise/ fan sounds.I got this hoping it would help with my very annoying indoor allergies (dust mites, mold, cats & dogs) and to reduce the odor from my cat’s litter box. I’ve only been using it for 5 days near the litter box and I’ve definitely noticed a reduction in odor, whether or not that’s simply from increased air flow idk lol. I have noticed a slight difference in allergies, but that effectiveness could be masked by the fact that I let my pets sleep in bed with me and it’s prime outdoor allergy season here in Michigan, which also plague me.Only con is that I haven’t been able to find any replacement filters for this yet and the manual does not give filter specs or brands for when it’s time to replace it.Overall, it’s working for me so far. Seems like an affordable small space solution to some big problems. I will continue to update this review as time goes on. If anything changes I’ll be back :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best value there is .
reviews.reviewText: This is my 6th air purifier. Why spend stupid amounts of money when these beauties are just as effective? I've measured their effectiveness with air quality gauges. They also make a very good gift for the holidays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars When does auto kick in?
reviews.reviewText: Small size and low price for replacement filters is great. Very low noise on low and medium fan is good white noise for sleep. I don't understand how the auto mode is really supposed to work. We have a couple of these and when I put my air quality monitor next to it and pound the carpet to raise dust, nothing happens. See photo. I've had the dylos air quality monitor above 300 which is noted as "fair" air quality on the Dylos, and the Yiou does not kick into a new gear. We will be returning at least one of these since I'm in the 30 day window. Might keep one for a smaller room since the price is good and replacement filters are cheap. We will not depend on auto mode or air quality monitoring with any remaining units.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don’t splurge on expensive units when this one works!
reviews.reviewText: I got 2 of these for my home and will likely purchase a third. My spouse is allergic to dogs so I got one of these for our bedroom and one for the living room. My house is just under 1100 sq ft and it covers majority of the space. I do run my EufyHome vacuum every day and my normal vacuum and mop every Sunday and so far my spouse has been good with his allergies. He did test the purifier and blew vape smoke into it to see if it would do anything and within 5 seconds, the lights turned red and the purifier kicked into high gear. I’ve witnessed it do it when I blow out my candles in the house and also when I spray Lysol.It’s nice and quiet. The feature to be able to turn the light off in our bedroom is also a plus to keep the room dark. We can barely hear it running. Same with the one in the living room.The third one I will get will be for my kids’ bedroom, which is also where the dog sleeps. It has a slight doggie smell to it since the dog sleeps there also, so I think this will help in that room.A lot of the people that come into our house have said they can’t even tell we have a dog because it doesn’t smell like one, and I think it has a lot to do with the air purifiers. Our dog is also a Basset Hound, which are known to be pretty smelly. So, the comments on not even knowing we have a dog due to no smell makes me pretty darn happy.I almost splurged on a $300 purifier and I’m really glad this came up as suggested from Amazon. I got a $20 off coupon to use so it was a steal. Super happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This reduction really wok I smoked a cigarette and the light turn red and it's bigger than what I thought to like damn great product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I liked it so much I bought a second unit.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up. Compact, and nice looking unit. Nice white noise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's quiet, lots of features, works great.
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with the purchase. We bought two. When we fried some fish the unit noticed the poor air quality. The light turned red and the fan speed increased. It cleaned the air within 30 minutes. Great little air purifier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2021
reviews.reviewText: This air purifier is easy to use and the sleep mode is very quiet. There are different modes and timer settings. It also has a night light which can be turned off easily. I usually set it at auto mode so I don’t need to check on it.I bought this air purifier because I noticed my dogs have been sneezing a lot. They go outside three times a day and whenever they come back in, they start sneezing here and there. I figured it’s because of the pollen outside and the dust indoor. I turned the machine on as soon as I received it. The air quality sensor lights on both sides were yellow at first, then about 10-20 minutes later, the lights turned green! After a few weeks of use now, I do notice my dogs sneeze less now, so I keep it near my dogs’ area on auto mode that way they have fresh air all the time. Overall, I’m happy to have bought this air purifier!
